data.prayer: There are 1,339,100 people living in the county of Sivaganga. Only about 14,730 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sivaganga, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sivaganga, Tamil Nadu, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 14,730 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Sivaganga that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Ambalavasi people. Make the Ambalavasi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Sivaganga. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Sivaganga, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sivaganga, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 1,339,100.

We estimate Sivaganga has 14,730 people who might know Jesus, 16,248 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,308,122 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Sivaganga, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Sivaganga
location.people_groups_list: Ambalavasi Kambalattu, Bazigar (Hindu traditions), Ambattan, Amma Kodaga, Vakkaliga Gangadikara
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Ambalavasi Kambalattu (2,900), Bazigar (Hindu traditions) (327,000), Ambattan (178,000), Amma Kodaga (2,000), Vakkaliga Gangadikara (535,000)
